programme.title: Nightbreed: Director's Cut
programme.desc: A man (Craig Sheffer) tries to join the monsters his psychiatrist (David Cronenberg) wants to destroy.

programme.title: Brain Damage
programme.desc: A boy (Rick Herbst) grows addicted to psychedelic jolts from an eel-like brain-eating monster called Elmer.

programme.title: Nightbreed: Director's Cut
programme.desc: A man (Craig Sheffer) tries to join the monsters his psychiatrist (David Cronenberg) wants to destroy.

programme.title: Brain Damage
programme.desc: A boy (Rick Herbst) grows addicted to psychedelic jolts from an eel-like brain-eating monster called Elmer.

programme.title: Street Trash
programme.desc: A case of contaminated alcohol has a debilitating effect on the vagabonds haunting the streets and junkyards of Brooklyn.

programme.title: Underground
programme.desc: In the midst of a spirited bachelorette party, friends find themselves on an unexpected and harrowing journey through an underground bunker complex, a long-forgotten fortification from World War II.

programme.title: History of the Occult
programme.desc: On the final broadcast of "60 Minutes to Midnight," Adrian Marcato exposes a conspiracy that links the government to a coven.

programme.title: Mercenary
programme.desc: An electronics mogul (John Ritter) coerces a former commander (Olivier Gruner) into helping him find the terrorist who killed his wife.

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: The warden of a 2022 prison sends an ex-Marine (Ray Liotta) to a jungle island where inmates are left to die.

programme.title: Assassin
programme.desc: A federal agent (Robert Conrad) is yanked from retirement to stop an out-of-control android (Richard Young) programmed to kill.

programme.title: Secret Reunion
programme.desc: A fired South Korean agent and a deserted North Korean spy meet by chance after six years and start a business partnership, each with the intention of stealing information from the other.

programme.title: Golgo 13
programme.desc: An internationally known killer-for-hire accepts jobs around the globe.

programme.title: Seven Swords: The Eye of Shura
programme.desc: At the turn of the Qing Dynasty, heroes and villains everywhere are in a frenzy.
